author: Simon Difford
description: Juicy (freshly squeezed orange, grapefruit and lime) and refreshing slightly salty tequila invigorated with sparkling grapefruit soda.Wetting the porous clay exterior of the Cantaritos pot not only improves its appearance but as the water evaporates from the outside so it helps keep the contents cold.
glassWare: Cantaritos clay pot or Collins glass
name: Cantaritos

recipeInstructions.text: If using a Cantaritos clay pot (instead of a collins glass) submerge the pot in cold water to clean the inside and wet the outside clay
POUR ingredients into ice-filled pot or glass and STIR
